name: Collider (itch) (PreMadePizza)
description: Collider is a simple arcade game featuring 10 levels and an endless mode. The player controls a hexagon with the ability to dash upwards. The mission is to use the bouncing mechanic to move the hexagon into the portal to reach the next level or stage. The game requires either extreme skill or extreme luck as the levels/stages get increasingly harder down the line.
